com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model

Class DurationFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model.DurationFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DurationFormat
extends java.text.Format
    Formats a duration object into a consumable String. For example, a 3,600,000 msec duration value is returned as a "1 hr." String.

    Formatting can be configured with several properties such as the length of the working day (setMillisPerDay(long)) and the number of working days per week (setDaysPerWeek(int)).
    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
